OK Luis is officially cool now. :D
Also, this is sorta interesting how people are
ditching Nintendo solely because they are making a new
character design for Link. I mean, come on....Link
looked more detailed on "Zelda II (NES)" than "Zelda
(NES)," but did the gameplay back up the visuals?
Hardly. Zelda 1 kicked major ascot, gameplay-wise.
Zelda 2 just kinda.....stunk. Well Miyamoto is taking
Zelda back to its more youth-oriented roots. Does that
mean the gameplay's going to suck? Hardly. EAD has
become a master of gameplay over the past 10+ years.
Zelda will be glorious, just wait and see.
And if I may make an additional comment...that footage
of Zelda was supposed to have amazingly smooth
animation, and many people have changed their
positions  from "oh his character design looks like
poop," to "this is going to kick major arse." I don't
have QuickTime, so I can't watch it. :-( But still, if
you can, download the video and don't be so quick to
decide when you haven't even played it.... It seems
everyone is being a bit whiny about it. :P
Nintendo knows video games. Sorry if their in-house
stuff isn't more "mature" (since when was it ever
mature?). I do have a complaint about Link's design
though. What's with the Egyptian-heiroglyph eyes?
